mods.abstract: MULATTO-BOY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 19th instant, a Mulatto-Boy, calling him ONEZIME, and saying he belongs to Mr. John Fahey, living on Waxia, in this Parish. This mulatto-boy is about 20 years old, five feet, six inches high, speaks English and French. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be dealt with according to law. LOUIS L. BOUTTE, Jailor. Opelousas, September 23d, 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
